location.name: Living Room
location.description:
You are in your living room. A single lazy-boy recliner sits against the wall, and an aging TV sits across from it. Takeout containers and beer cans litter the ground. Some items sit on the desk in the corner. Sunlight seeps in through a crack in the window drapes.
There is a door leading to the BEDROOM behind you. There is a door leading OUTSIDE to your right.

item.name: Keys
item.description: Your house KEYS, and the KEYS to your office.

item.name: Wallet
item.description: A worn leather WALLET that holds your id, Bank Card, and whatever loose change you happen to have.
item.use: You try to use your wallet.

item.name: Pass
item.description: A plain lanyard that holds your work security PASS.

item.name: Remote
item.description: A black, cheap plastic REMOTE that came with the TV.
item.use: Nothing happens. Your T.V. has been broken for months.

triggers.trigger: MUST_HAVE NONE This should never be triggered.

location.name: Bedroom
location.description:
You are in your bedroom. Your eyes take some time to adjust to the darkness. A single-size mattress lays in the corner with a rough woolen blanket tossed across it. Clothes lay piled on the floor. A digital alarm clock lays on the floor beside the mattress flashing '12:00'.
The door to your LIVING ROOM is behind you. The EN SUITE BATHROOM is to your left.

item.name: Clothes
item.description: Your CLOTHES for the day; Business casual attire, but slightly stained and very rumpled.

item.name: Blanket
item.use: You wrap yourself in the blanket. It's warm, but now you're itching everywhere.

triggers.trigger: MUST_HAVE NONE This should never be triggered.

location.name: Bathroom
location.description:
Despite the state of the rest of the house, your bathroom is surprisingly clean. Nothing else to remark.
The door back to your BEDROOM is behind you.

triggers.trigger: MUST_HAVE NONE This should never be triggered.

location.name: House
location.description:
You are outside your house. In front of you is a small, one story building with fading white clapboard and shingles beginning to peel off. There is a dead flower garden flanking the front steps. The whole place has definitely seen better days.
Your front door is in front of you. The road and bus stop are behind you, down your short driveway.

triggers.trigger: MUST_HAVE CLOTHES You should probably put some clothes on.

location.name: Bus Stop
location.description:
Just as you take a seat to wait for the bus, it comes into view and lurches to a violent stop with a screech of rubber.
The bus to your OFFICE BUILDING is ahead of you. Your HOUSE is behind you.

triggers.trigger: MUST_HAVE WALLET You have no way to to pay for you bus fare.

location.name: Office Exterior
location.description:
You reach the outside of your office building, an unassuming five storey structure.
The front ENTRANCE is in front of you. The BUS STOP is behind you. The PARK is to your right. The CAFE is to your left.

triggers.trigger: MUST_HAVE NONE This should never be triggered

location.name: Park
location.description:
You decide to head over to the city park, only a block away from your office building. In fact, you can actually see it out of your office window. It's well kept with plenty of places to sit and reflect. The main attraction is a tranquil pond located centrally that is home to countless ducks and geese.
Your OFFICE BUILDING is to your right, back down the road.

item.name: Stick
item.description: A small STICK fallen from the branch of a tree.
item.use: You hit yourself with the stick. It hurts. What did you expect?

triggers.trigger: MUST_HAVE NONE Shouldn't be triggered

location.name: Cafe
location.description:
You arrive at the cute little cafe a short walk from your office building. The sun is shining nicely today, and the combination of sunlight spreading across the outdoor seating area and the smell of roasting coffee is rather pleasant.
Your OFFICE BUILDING is to your left, back down the road.

triggers.trigger: MUST_HAVE NONE Shouldn't be triggered

location.name: Office Lobby
location.description:
You tap your security pass to the sensor and enter the lobby of your office building. The interior is overly air-conditioned, and goosebumps immediatly start to form on your arms. Ahead of you is metal-detecting archway with a sign reminding you to empty your pockets of metallic objects before passing through. Your items will be waiting for you on the other side.
The ARCHWAY is in front of you. The EXIT is behind you.

triggers.trigger: MUST_HAVE PASS You don't have your security pass on you and consequently can't enter the building.

location.name: Office Security
location.description:
You pass through to the other side of the scanner.
The MAIN ATRIUM opens up in front of you.

triggers.trigger: MUST_NOT_HAVE KEYS You left your keys in your pocket, and the alarm goes of. What did you expect? Try again.
MUST_NOT_HAVE WALLET You left your wallet in your pocket, and the alarm goes of. What did you expect? Try again.
MUST_NOT_HAVE REMOTE For some reason you had your TV Remote on you, and the alarm goes of. What did you expect? Try again.

location.name: Office Atrium
location.description:
You step out into a grand atrium. The exterior of the building certainly doesn't let on the grandeur contained within. A domed glass skylight lets golden rays of sun spill across the central waiting area. The walls and supporting columns appear to be made of a milky white marble with golden inlays in intricate patterns. Looking up, you can see balconies encircling the open area for each of the five stories. It really is an impressive sight to behold.
In front of you is the RECEPTION DESK. Behind you is the way you came in, through the SECURITY CORRIDOR. To your left are the main floor WASHROOMS. To your right is the ELEVATOR up to the floor that your office is on.

triggers.trigger: MUST_HAVE NONE Shouldn't be triggered

location.name: Office Reception
location.description:
You walk up to the reception area. Normally a sweet younger lady sits behind the solid marble counter, greeting newcomers. Today however, the entire atrium is deserted.
You begin to feel uneasy.
The ATRIUM is behind you.

triggers.trigger: MUST_HAVE NONE Shouldn't be triggered

location.name: Washrooms
location.description:
The washrooms are just as luxurious as the atrium you just came from. You note the stylistic change in marble from smooth, creamy white, to deep black with white flecks. The gold inlay is just as prevalent, and is now complemented by a host of gold and brass handles, fittings, faucets, and lighting fixtures.
The ATRIUM is behind you.

triggers.trigger: MUST_HAVE NONE Shouldn't be triggered

location.name: Elevator
location.description:
You step into the elevator. Not surprisingly, it is outfitted with the same taste and expense as the rest of the building. You tap your security pass, and the doors close with a hiss. You feel slightly heavier as the elevetor begins its ascent.
Suddenly, the main lighting shuts down and you are left in the red glow a single emergency light set into the ceiling. An alarm starts to sound.
You hear the shriek of tearing steel and your stomach lurches up into your throat as the floor drops from under you. You slam into the roof of the now free falling elevator.
Suddenly everything stops and you slam equally hard against the elevator floor.
Picking yourself up, you see that the mangled elevator doors in front of you leave just enough room to slip through them.

triggers.trigger: MUST_HAVE PASS You need your security pass to activate the elevator.

location.name: Elevator Hallway
location.description:
You are at the beginning of a long hallway. The alarm still rings in the background, and the entire length of the hall is bathed in rotating red emergency lights.
New debris has rendered the ELEVATOR behind you inaccessible, not that you could use it anyways. The rest of the HALLWAY opens up in front of you.

triggers.trigger: MUST_HAVE NONE Shouldn't be triggered

location.name: Junction Hallway
location.description:
You are roughly in the middle of the hallway. Every time the rotating red lights pass along the walls, you can see two doorways, one on each side of you. At the end of the hall you can make out what you believe is an EXIT sign.
The END of the hall is in front of you. The BEGINNING of the hall is behind you. There is a DOOR to your left. There is a DOOR to you right

triggers.trigger: MUST_HAVE NONE Shouldn't be triggered
MUST_HAVE NONE Shouldn't be triggered
MUST_HAVE NONE Shouldn't be triggered

item.name: Toothbrush
item.description: A TOOTHBRUSH, the thing you use to brush your teeth every couple days or so.
item.use: Surprisingly you decide to brush your teeth.
